sentences.sentence: Once upon a time there was a wicked sprite, indeed he was the most mischievous of all sprites.
sentences.translation: 从前有一个邪恶的精灵，他是所有精灵中最淘气的一个。

sentences.sentence: When you created a variable in scratch, you could either make it for this sprite only or for all sprites.
sentences.translation: 当你在 scratch 中创建一个变量，你可以仅针对该精灵或针对所有精灵进行创建。

sentences.sentence: Now, focus on just one of these sprites.
sentences.translation: 现在，把注意力集中到其中的一个小精灵。
